7#ifndef PKSAV_GEN2_DAYCARE_DATA_H
8#define PKSAV_GEN2_DAYCARE_DATA_H
9
10#include <pksav/gen2/pokemon.h>
11
12#include <stdint.h>
13
14#define PKSAV_GEN2_DAYCARE_MAN_POKEMON_PRESENT_MASK ((uint8_t)1)
15#define PKSAV_GEN2_DAYCARE_MAN_ARE_POKEMON_COMPATIBLE_MASK ((uint8_t)(1 << 5))
16#define PKSAV_GEN2_DAYCARE_MAN_IS_EGG_READY_MASK ((uint8_t)(1 << 6))
17#define PKSAV_GEN2_DAYCARE_MAN_IS_ACTIVE_MASK ((uint8_t)(1 << 7))
18
19#define PKSAV_GEN2_DAYCARE_LADY_POKEMON_PRESENT_MASK ((uint8_t)1)
20#define PKSAV_GEN2_DAYCARE_LADY_IS_ACTIVE_MASK ((uint8_t)(1 << 7))
21
22#define PKSAV_GEN2_DAYCARE_BREED_IS_NOT_MOTHER_OR_NON_DITTO ((uint8_t)0)
23#define PKSAV_GEN2_DAYCARE_BREED_IS_MOTHER_OR_NON_DITTO ((uint8_t)1)
24
25#pragma pack(push,1)
26
27struct pksav_gen2_daycare_pokemon_data
28{
29 uint8_t nickname[PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_NICKNAME_LENGTH];
30 uint8_t otname[PKSAV_GEN2_POKEMON_OTNAME_STORAGE_LENGTH];
31 struct pksav_gen2_pc_pokemon pokemon;
32};
33
34struct pksav_gen2_daycare_data
35{
36 uint8_t daycare_man_fields;
37 struct pksav_gen2_daycare_pokemon_data stored_pokemon1_data;
38
39 uint8_t daycare_lady_fields;
40 uint8_t steps_to_egg;
41 uint8_t is_breed_mother_or_non_ditto;
42 struct pksav_gen2_daycare_pokemon_data stored_pokemon2_data;
43
44 struct pksav_gen2_daycare_pokemon_data egg_pokemon_data;
45};
46
47#pragma pack(pop)
48
49#endif /* PKSAV_GEN2_DAYCARE_DATA_H */
